string.value: When I asked #p2022003# about #p1032001#, I could tell he was very resentful towards #p1032001# and #p2020009#. Let's go back to #b#p1032001##k and tell him about #p2022003#.
#p1032001# looked disappointed as he said how #p2022003# used to be a great Magician...
I'm sick of being here. Until when should I be here?... \n\r#L0# #b...do you know about Grendel the Really Old?#k

#p1032001#! #p1032001#! Oh! I definitely know them! #p1032001# a friend of Shammos! #p1032001# betrayal! He took all my power with the help of #p2020009# and put me in this dark and damp prison! I hate #p1032001#!
He was jealous! Because he couldn't get the magic! I, #p2022003# made! Even #p2020009# and #p1032001# couldn't do it!!! Tell #b#p1032001##k that the best magician is #p2022003#!
Did you meet #p2022003#? Did he come back to his senses by any chance? It seems that he fades in and out of consiousness these days...
...Did he talk about #p1032001#? It's impossible. He lost all his memory as a human being, but his memory is coming back to him.

#p2022003# is a genius in magic and a friend of this #p1032001#. We didn't keep in touch for a long time, learning magic. I don't even know he was indulged in that kind of magic. When I met him again, he was a Hobi...
I know he still blames #bme#k and #bRobeira#k for he has been imprisoned for a long time. His magic skills were excellent... If they were not so dangerous, he be a living legend even now.
Let me out! Please! #p1032001#... You were my friend!
